data.name: Strike Back
data.description:
The world order has been turned upside down when the terrorist organizations gradually grew to be on par with the superpowers, as an elite special agent in the international anti-terrorist organization, you have the task of infiltrating and destroying the organization from the inside.

You can experience the game through 3 game modes: Campaign, Zombie, PvP.

Campaign Mode: Your enemies have artificial intelligence and act like the real thing, they will give you really impressive challenges.

Zombie Mode: Zombies will attack you like a flood, and the horror mutant creatures will bring you a feeling you have never had before.

PVP mode, players can compete with friends or compete with many other online players in the arena. Rare medals and rewards will be given to those with a high rank in the arena.

The game is designed extremely detailed and meticulous. Each mission is a new challenge with different context, different difficulty and different boss.

With extremely impressive graphics from the background to the characters, it is guaranteed to bring extremely vivid experiences to players.

What are you waiting for, let's start experiencing the game.
